verses.text: \w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w brought|strong="H3381"\w* \w into|strong="H0376"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* Putiphar \w an|strong="H8033"\w* \w eunuch|strong="H5631"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* Pharao, \w chief|strong="H8269"\w* \w captain|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* army, \w an|strong="H8033"\w* \w Egyptian|strong="H4713"\w*, \w bought|strong="H7069"\w* \w him|strong="H3381"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* Ismaelites, \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w brought|strong="H3381"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w him|strong="H0854"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w prosperous|strong="H6743"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H0376"\w* \w things|strong="H1961"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* dwelt \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w master’s|strong="H0113"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*,

\w Who|strong="H0834"\w* knew very \w well|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w him|strong="H0854"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w prosper|strong="H6743"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w Neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w other|strong="H3605"\w* \w thing|strong="H3588"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w ate|strong="H0398"\w*. \w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w beautiful|strong="H3303"\w* countenance, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* comely \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w behold|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5869"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* many days \w his|strong="H5375"\w* mistress cast \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Lie|strong="H7901"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w*, \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* wise consenting \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* wicked act, \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w*: \w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w master|strong="H0113"\w* hath \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* knoweth \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* own \w house|strong="H1004"\w*:

\w Neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w any|strong="H4480"\w* \w thing|strong="H2088"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H0834"\w* power, \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* delivered \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* thee, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* art \w his|strong="H0834"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*: \w how|strong="H0349"\w* \w then|strong="H2088"\w* \w can|strong="H0518"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7451"\w* \w thing|strong="H2088"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* \w against|strong="H4480"\w* \w my|strong="H0834"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*?

\w With|strong="H5973"\w* \w such|strong="H1696"\w* words \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w these|strong="H1696"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w by|strong="H0413"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, both \w the|strong="H0413"\w* woman \w was|strong="H1961"\w* importunate \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w young|strong="H3117"\w* man, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w refused|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* adultery.

\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H8033"\w* \w happened|strong="H1961"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w certain|strong="H0376"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H1004"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w was|strong="H0369"\w* \w doing|strong="H6213"\w* \w some|strong="H0376"\w* \w business|strong="H4399"\w* \w without|strong="H0369"\w* \w any|strong="H0376"\w*, \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w him|strong="H0935"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w she|strong="H7901"\w* catching \w the|strong="H0559"\w* skirt \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w garment|strong="H0899"\w*, \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Lie|strong="H7901"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w me|strong="H5973"\w*. \w But|strong="H5800"\w* \w he|strong="H3318"\w* \w leaving|strong="H5800"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w garment|strong="H0899"\w* \w in|strong="H7901"\w* \w her|strong="H0559"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w fled|strong="H5127"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* woman \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w garment|strong="H0899"\w* \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w her|strong="H7200"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w herself|strong="H3027"\w* disregarded,

\w She|strong="H7121"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w See|strong="H7200"\w*, \w he|strong="H0376"\w* hath \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* \w Hebrew|strong="H5680"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* abuse \w us|strong="H0413"\w*: \w he|strong="H0376"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H7200"\w* \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* \w out|strong="H0413"\w*,

\w And|strong="H6963"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w left|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w garment|strong="H0899"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w held|strong="H7311"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w got|strong="H3318"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*.

\w For|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* proof therefore \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* fidelity, \w she|strong="H5704"\w* kept \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w garment|strong="H0899"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* shewed \w it|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* husband \w when|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w returned|strong="H0935"\w* \w home|strong="H1004"\w*:

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w Hebrew|strong="H5680"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* thou hast \w brought|strong="H0935"\w*, \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* abuse \w me|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6963"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H2351"\w* \w heard|strong="H6963"\w* \w me|strong="H6963"\w* \w cry|strong="H7121"\w*, \w he|strong="H2351"\w* \w left|strong="H5800"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w garment|strong="H0899"\w* which \w I|strong="H6963"\w* \w held|strong="H7311"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* \w out|strong="H2351"\w*.

\w His|strong="H8085"\w* \w master|strong="H0113"\w* \w hearing|strong="H8085"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w things|strong="H1697"\w*, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w giving|strong="H1696"\w* too \w much|strong="H1697"\w* credit \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w wife’s|strong="H0802"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w very|strong="H2734"\w* \w angry|strong="H2734"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w cast|strong="H5414"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w prison|strong="H1004"\w*, \w where|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w prisoners|strong="H0631"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w kept|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* shut \w up|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w having|strong="H1961"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* \w upon|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* favour \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w chief|strong="H8269"\w* \w keeper|strong="H5470"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w prison|strong="H1004"\w*:

\w Who|strong="H0834"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w prisoners|strong="H0615"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w kept|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w custody|strong="H3027"\w*: \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w whatsoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w under|strong="H3027"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*.
